history.content:
Classes with different lecture times certainly can have the same final time, most frequently if they are in the same final exam group.

But it is also possible for a final exam to be scheduled not in the usual time for the exam group (if the petition by the instructors is approved); as the page you linked says, at the top:

"Please note this calendar is only a guideline for faculty and students to get a sense of when their final exam may take place before classes are assigned rooms.  The actual form of final evaluation for a course, as well as the date and time, must be included in the course syllabus at the beginning of the semester."

I have also heard that this will be happening more frequently this semester due to scheduling difficulties (e.g. Wheeler being renovated).

Classes with different lecture times certainly can have the same final time, most frequently if they are in the same final exam group.

But it is also possible for a final exam to be scheduled not in the usual time for the exam group (if the petition by the instructors is approved); as the page you linked says, at the top:

"Please note this calendar is only a guideline for faculty and students to get a sense of when their final exam may take place before classes are assigned rooms.  The actual form of final evaluation for a course, as well as the date and time, must be included in the course syllabus at the beginning of the semester."
I spoke with Prof. Pister and this was a typo. It should be updated to reflect the approved exam time. Thanks for pointing this out!

From the course web page of EE147, the final time is Thursday 7-10pm. However, this does not agree with what the final time it should be from the general final schedule guidelines, which is supposed to be Wednesday 7-10pm. http://schedule.berkeley.edu/examf.html

As a result, the final time of EE147 conflicts with the MWF 9:00-10:00am class I take. Is that a mistake? Classes with different lecture time are not supposed to have the same final time. My schedule becomes problematic due to this issue. Hope this issue can be fixed. Thanks!
history.subject: EE147 weird final time
